price: Оё ӯ бар ғайб огоҳӣ ёфтааст, ё аз [Аллоҳи] Раҳмон паймоне гирифтааст?
arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aṭṭalaʿa al-ghayba ami ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
